posts.title: CS Academy Round 6 简要题解
posts.text:
A 一道由于我过于沙雕调了很久的模拟题 CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=1e5+5;int n,lens;bool okpre[N],oksuf[N];char s[N],t[N];int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif scanf("%d",&n); scanf("%s",s+1),lens=strlen(s+1); int res=0; for(ri len,tt=1;tt<=n;++tt) { scanf("%s",t+1); len=strlen(t+1); if(max(lens,len)-min(lens,len)>1) continue; okpre[0]=oksuf[len+1]=1; for(ri i=1;i<=len;++i) okpre[i]=oksuf[i]=0; for(ri i=1;i<=len&&i<=lens;++i) okpre[i]=okpre[i-1]&&(s[i]==t[i]); for(ri i=len,j=lens;i&&j;--i,--j) oksuf[i]=oksuf[i+1]&&(s[j]==t[i]); if(len==lens) { bool ff=0; for(ri i=1;i<=len;++i) if(okpre[i-1]&&oksuf[i+1]) { ff=1; break; } if(ff) ++res; } else if(len==lens-1) { bool ff=0; for(ri i=1;i<=len+1;++i) if(okpre[i-1]&&oksuf[i]) { ff=1; break; } if(ff) ++res; } else { bool ff=0; for(ri i=1;i<=len;++i) if(okpre[i-1]&&oksuf[i+1]) { ff=1; break; } if(ff) ++res; } } cout<<res; return 0;} B 双指针扫一下 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=1e5+5;int n,k,ps[N];int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),k=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) ps[i]=read(); sort(ps+1,ps+n+1); ps[++n]=0x3f3f3f3f; int res=0; for(ri pre=0,l=1,r=0;r<=n;++l,pre-=ps[l]-ps[l-1]-1) { if(l>r) { pre=0; r=l; } while(r<n&&pre+ps[r+1]-ps[r]-1<=k) ++r,pre+=ps[r]-ps[r-1]-1; res=max(res,ps[r]-ps[l]+1+(k-pre)); } cout<<res; return 0;} C 瞎猜了一个错的结论结果还过了 MD绝了 这里放一个错了的代码 CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=1e5+5;int n,ct1,ct2,ss;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt) { n=read(); ct1=0,ct2=0,ss=0; for(ri i=1,x;i<=n;++i) { if((x=read())==1) ++ct1; else ++ct2,ss^=x; } if(!ct2) cout<<(ct1&1?"A
":"B
"); else cout<<(ss?"A
":"B
"); } return 0;} 然后正解就是看有没有出现奇数次的元素，有的话就 winwinwin 了 没有代码 D 说来惭愧，我会 E,F 不会 D 才不会告诉你是因为把题看错了以为是 fft 题于是不想写了呢，首先是得考虑到每两行之间没啥关系，因此只用考虑 n=2n=2n=2 的情况，发现这个时候如果有一个元素出现超过 mmm 次一定不合法，否则一定能贪心+堆构造一波合法答案，然后拓展到多行即可 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=1e6+5;vector<int>a[N],L[N],R[N];int n,m;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) { a[i].resize(m+1); for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j) a[i][j]=read(); } for(ri i=2,ps;i<=n;++i) { vector<int>vl; for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j) { vl.pb(a[i-1][j]); L[a[i-1][j]].pb(j); vl.pb(a[i][j]); R[a[i][j]].pb(j); } sort(vl.begin(),vl.end()); vl.erase(unique(vl.begin(),vl.end()),vl.end()); set<pii>A,B; for(ri j=0,_vl;j<(int)vl.size();++j) { _vl=vl[j]; if((int)L[_vl].size()+(int)R[_vl].size()>m) return puts("-1"),0; if((int)L[_vl].size()) A.insert(pii((int)L[_vl].size()+(int)R[_vl].size(),_vl)); if((int)R[_vl].size()) B.insert(pii((int)L[_vl].size()+(int)R[_vl].size(),_vl)); } while((int)A.size()) { pii vlx=*A.rbegin(),vly; A.erase(vlx); B.erase(vlx); vly=*B.rbegin(); A.erase(vly); B.erase(vly); a[i][L[vlx.se].back()]=vly.se; L[vlx.se].pop_back(); R[vly.se].pop_back(); if((int)L[vlx.se].size()) A.insert(pii((int)L[vlx.se].size()+(int)R[vlx.se].size(),vlx.se)); if((int)R[vlx.se].size()) B.insert(pii((int)L[vlx.se].size()+(int)R[vlx.se].size(),vlx.se)); if((int)L[vly.se].size()) A.insert(pii((int)L[vly.se].size()+(int)R[vly.se].size(),vly.se)); if((int)R[vly.se].size()) B.insert(pii((int)L[vly.se].size()+(int)R[vly.se].size(),vly.se)); } } for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i,puts("")) for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j) cout<<a[i][j]<<' '; return 0;} E 一开始没看到最长两个字感觉是 sbt 结果写完交上去发现没过样例 冷静了一下发现 lis 的话随便构造一下就过了。 CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=105;int K;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif cin>>K; for(ri t,ct=1;K;K/=10,++ct) { t=K%10; for(ri i=1;i<=t;++i) cout<<ct<<' '; if(K>9)cout<<500000000+ct<<' '; for(ri i=t+1;i<=min(K,10);++i) cout<<ct<<' '; } return 0;} F 把所有环的异或值提出来做线性基即可，引起我极度舒适 CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=1e5+5;int n,m;ll dis[N],a[105];vector<pair<int,ll> >e[N];bool vs[N];inline void insert(ll x) { for(ri i=63;~i;--i) { if(!x) break; if(x>>i&1) { if(a[i]) x^=a[i]; else { a[i]=x; break; } } }}inline ll query() { ll res=0; for(ri i=63;~i;--i) res=max(res,res^a[i]); return res;}inline void dfs(int p) { vs[p]=1; for(ri i=0,v;i<(int)e[p].size();++i) { if(vs[v=e[p][i].fi]) { insert(dis[p]^dis[v]^e[p][i].se); continue; } dis[v]=dis[p]^e[p][i].se; dfs(v); }}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(); ll w; for(ri i=1,u,v;i<=m;++i) { u=read(),v=read(),w=readl(); e[u].pb(make_pair(v,w)); e[v].pb(make_pair(u,w)); } dfs(1); cout<<query(); return 0;}

posts.title: CS Academy Round 5 简要题解
posts.text: A 模拟题 CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=105;int n,a[N][N];int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) for(ri j=1;j<=n;++j) a[i][j]=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i,puts("")) for(ri j=1;j<=n;++j) { bool ff=0; if(a[i][j]) ff=1; if(a[j][n-i+1]) ff=1; if(a[n-i+1][n-j+1]) ff=1; if(a[n-j+1][i]) ff=1; if(ff) cout<<1; else cout<<0; cout<<' '; } return 0;} B bfs 打一下标记即可 CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283848586#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=1e5+5;int n,m,S,A,B,dis[N];bool ff1[N],ff2[N];vector<int>e[N];int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(); S=read(),A=read(),B=read(); for(ri u,v,i=1;i<=m;++i) { u=read(),v=read(); e[u].pb(v),e[v].pb(u); } queue<int>q; q.push(S),dis[S]=1; while((int)q.size()) { int x=q.front(); q.pop(); for(ri i=0,v;i<(int)e[x].size();++i) { if(dis[v=e[x][i]]) continue; dis[v]=dis[x]+1; q.push(v); } } q.push(A); while((int)q.size()) { int x=q.front(); q.pop(); for(ri i=0,v;i<(int)e[x].size();++i) { if(dis[v=e[x][i]]!=dis[x]-1) continue; ff1[v]=1; q.push(v); } } q.push(B); while((int)q.size()) { int x=q.front(); q.pop(); for(ri i=0,v;i<(int)e[x].size();++i) { if(dis[v=e[x][i]]!=dis[x]-1) continue; ff2[v]=1; q.push(v); } } int res=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) if(ff1[i]&&ff2[i]) res=max(res,dis[i]-1); cout<<res; return 0;} C 貌似是跟 CSP-S day1t1 类似的题就这样我居然vp的时候也挂了一次 把每个数 reverse 之后的确切下标求出来比大小就可以了 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=1e5+5;int n,m,a[N];inline int calc(int x,int l,int r,int pw) { if(l==r) return l; int mid=(l+r-1)>>1; if(!(x/pw%2)) return calc(x,mid+1,r,pw<<1); return calc(x,l,mid,pw<<1);}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i) a[i]=calc(read()-1,0,n-1,1); for(ri i=1;i<m;++i) if(a[i]>a[i+1]) { puts("0"); return 0; } puts("1"); return 0;} D 模拟题 看完题面感觉是什么物理神题就跑去看后面的结果后来发现被骗了。 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; bool f=1; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=1e6+5;int n,m,f1,f2;vector<int>e[N];pii a[N];int vlx[N],vly[N],sx=0,sy=0;ll ssx,ssy;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(),f1=read(),f2=read(); for(ri i=1,u,v;i<=m;++i) { u=read(),v=read(); e[u].pb(v); e[v].pb(u); } for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) ssx+=(a[i].fi=read()),ssy+=(a[i].se=read()); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) { ll resx,resy; resx=(ll)f2*((ll)n*a[i].fi-ssx); resy=(ll)f2*((ll)n*a[i].se-ssy); for(ri j=0;j<(int)e[i].size();++j) { resx+=(ll)(f1-f2)*(a[i].fi-a[e[i][j]].fi); resy+=(ll)(f1-f2)*(a[i].se-a[e[i][j]].se); } cout<<resx<<' '<<resy<<'\n'; } return 0;} E 这题居然 vp 的时候没切。 不过的确有个核心的东西没有考虑到，就是假设我们最后放置 000 的位置序列为 a1,a2,...,aka_1,a_2,...,a_ka1​,a2​,...,ak​ ，原本的位置为 ps1,ps2,...,pskps_1,ps_2,...,ps_kps1​,ps2​,...,psk​ 那么此时最小移动次数为 ∣a1−ps1∣+∣a2−ps2∣+⋯+∣ak−psk∣|a_1-ps_1|+|a_2-ps_2|+\cdots+|a_k-ps_k|∣a1​−ps1​∣+∣a2​−ps2​∣+⋯+∣ak​−psk​∣ 考虑设 fi,j,k=(a,b)f_{i,j,k}=(a,b)fi,j,k​=(a,b) 表示前 iii 个位置里面放了 jjj 个 000 ，已经匹配到第 jjj 个位置的时候的（匹配数最大值，移动次数最小值）这个二元组信息（优先第一元），结合上面的那个容易忘掉的条件就能很方便的转移了 CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(int*s) { int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) s[++top]=ch^48,ch=gc(); return top;}const int N=505,inf=1e9;int n,m,trans[N][2],cur,fail[N],s[N],t[N],ps[N],top=0;pii f[2][N][N];inline bool operator<(pii a,pii b) { return a.fi^b.fi?a.fi<b.fi:a.se>b.se; }inline void ckmax(pii&a,pii b) { if(a<b) a=b; }int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(s),m=read(t); for(ri i=1,j=0;i<m;++i) { while(j&&t[i+1]!=t[j+1]) j=fail[j]; fail[i+1]=t[i+1]==t[j+1]?++j:0; } for(ri k,i=0;i<=m;++i) { for(ri j=0;j<2;++j) { k=i==m?fail[i]:i; while(k&&j!=t[k+1]) k=fail[k]; trans[i][j]=j==t[k+1]?++k:0; } } for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) if(!s[i]) ps[++top]=i; for(ri i=0;i<2;++i) for(ri j=0;j<=m;++j) for(ri k=0;k<=top;++k) f[i][j][k]=pii(-inf,inf); f[cur=0][0][0]=pii(0,0); pii res=pii(-inf,inf); for(ri i=1;i<=n+1;++i) { cur^=1; for(ri j=0;j<=m;++j) for(ri k=0;k<=top;++k) f[cur][j][k]=pii(-inf,inf); for(ri j=0;j<=m;++j) for(ri k=0;k<=top;++k) if(f[cur^1][j][k].fi!=-inf) { if(i==n+1) { ckmax(res,f[cur^1][j][k]);continue; } if(k^top) ckmax(f[cur][trans[j][0]][k+1],pii(f[cur^1][j][k].fi+(trans[j][0]==m),f[cur^1][j][k].se+abs(ps[k+1]-i))); if(n-i+1!=top-k) ckmax(f[cur][trans[j][1]][k],pii(f[cur^1][j][k].fi+(trans[j][1]==m),f[cur^1][j][k].se)); } } cout<<res.fi<<' '<<res.se; return 0;} F 之前抄做过的神仙题 vp的时候直接贴了之前的代码，然后 vp 完之后又抄写了一发修了修锅 考虑假如只有两个环，那么一定只有环交处需要讨论 然后发现多个环的时候也只有环交需要讨论，那么考虑找环交的方法，发现可以每次找一个度为 222 的点把它删掉，然后把它两边的点用虚边连起来，最后环交处一定是二元环，然后设 fi,0/1,0/1f_{i,0/1,0/1}fi,0/1,0/1​ 表示第 iii 条边连接的 u,vu,vu,v 是否选择的时候的最优值，然后分情况转移就行了 CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}const int N=1e5+5,inf=1e9;pii E[N<<1];map<int,int>trans[N];set<int>e[N];int n,m,f[N<<1][2][2],tmp[2][2];bool ban[N<<1],vs[N];int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i) { E[i].fi=read(),E[i].se=read(); if(E[i].fi>E[i].se) swap(E[i].fi,E[i].se); f[i][0][1]=f[i][1][0]=1; f[i][1][1]=-inf; trans[E[i].fi][E[i].se]=i; e[E[i].fi].insert(i),e[E[i].se].insert(i); } queue<int>q; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) if((int)e[i].size()==2) vs[i]=1,q.push(i); while((int)q.size()) { int x=q.front(),pre,suf,A,B,id; q.pop(); if((int)e[x].size()!=2) continue; A=*e[x].begin(),e[x].erase(A); B=*e[x].begin(),e[x].erase(B); pre=E[A].fi^E[A].se^x; suf=E[B].fi^E[B].se^x; if(pre>suf) swap(A,B),swap(pre,suf); e[pre].erase(A),e[suf].erase(B); if(E[A].fi^pre) swap(E[A].fi,E[A].se),swap(f[A][0][1],f[A][1][0]); if(E[B].se^suf) swap(E[B].fi,E[B].se),swap(f[B][0][1],f[B][1][0]); for(ri i=0;i<2;++i) for(ri j=0;j<2;++j) tmp[i][j]=max(f[A][i][0]+f[B][0][j],f[A][i][1]+f[B][1][j]-1); if(trans[pre].count(suf)) { ban[A]=ban[B]=1; id=trans[pre][suf]; for(ri i=0;i<2;++i) for(ri j=0;j<2;++j) f[id][i][j]+=tmp[i][j]-i-j; } else { ban[B]=1; trans[pre][suf]=id=A; E[A]=pii(pre,suf); for(ri i=0;i<2;++i) for(ri j=0;j<2;++j) f[id][i][j]=tmp[i][j]; } e[pre].insert(id),e[suf].insert(id); if(!vs[pre]&&(int)e[pre].size()==2) q.push(pre),vs[pre]=1; if(!vs[suf]&&(int)e[suf].size()==2) q.push(suf),vs[suf]=1; } int res=0; for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i) if(!ban[i]) for(ri j=0;j<2;++j) for(ri k=0;k<2;++k) res=max(res,f[i][j][k]); cout<<res; return 0;}

posts.title: CS Academy Round 4 简要题解
posts.text:
Anagrams STL 操作题 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}map<string,int>S;int n;string s;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif cin>>n; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) cin>>s,sort(s.begin(),s.end()),++S[s]; int res=0; for(map<string,int>::iterator it=S.begin();it!=S.end();++it) res=max(res,it->se); cout<<res; return 0;} B 模拟题 目前貌似只会 O(log⁡n)O(\log n)O(logn) 做法，如果有 O(1)O(1)O(1) 做法欢迎来暴打博主 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll calc(int x) { if(!x) return 0; int tm=1,lm; ll res=0; while(tm<=x) { lm=x/tm; if(!(lm&1)) --lm; res+=(ll)(lm+1)*(lm+1)/4; tm<<=1; } return res;}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif for(ri l,r,tt=read();tt;--tt) { l=read(),r=read(); cout<<calc(r)-calc(l-1)<<'
'; } return 0;} C 手玩两下发现直接像样例一样贪心正确性有保证，用个 bitbitbit 维护下即可 CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}const int N=1e5+5;int n,a[N],bit[N],mch[N];map<int,int> ps;bool vs[N];inline int lowbit(int x) { return x&-x; }inline void update(int x,int v) { for(;x<=n;x+=lowbit(x)) bit[x]+=v; }inline int query(int x) { int ret=0;for(;x;x^=lowbit(x)) ret+=bit[x];return ret; }inline int query(int l,int r) { return query(r)-query(l-1); }int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) { a[i]=read(),update(i,1); if(ps.count(a[i])) mch[ps[a[i]]]=i; else ps[a[i]]=i; } ll res=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) if(!vs[i]) { vs[i]=vs[mch[i]]=1; res+=query(i+1,mch[i]-1); update(i,-1),update(mch[i],-1); } cout<<res; return 0;} D 拆成前缀异或和的异或后发现可以直接启发式合并+ 01trie01trie01trie 维护 vp的时候居然还被卡空间写了内存回收才过心态炸了 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127128129#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}const int N=1e5+5;int n,a[N],rt1[N],rt2[N],res[N],ps[N],ft[N];inline int find(int x) { return x^ft[x]?ft[x]=find(ft[x]):x; }bool ok[N];vector<int>S[N];namespace trie { int tot=0,son[30000005][2]; vector<int>stk; inline int newnode() { int res; if((int)stk.size()) res=stk.back(),stk.pop_back(); else res=++tot; return son[res][0]=son[res][1]=0,res; } inline void insert(int&x,int vl) { if(!x) x=newnode(); int p=x; for(ri t,i=30;~i;--i) { t=vl>>i&1; if(!son[p][t]) son[p][t]=newnode(); p=son[p][t]; } } inline int query(int x,int vl) { int res=0; for(ri t,i=30;~i;--i) { t=(vl>>i&1)^1; if(son[x][t]) x=son[x][t],res|=1<<i; else x=son[x][t^1]; } return res; } inline void clear(int x) { if(son[x][0]) clear(son[x][0]); if(son[x][1]) clear(son[x][1]); stk.pb(x); }}inline int merge1(int x,int y) { x=find(x),y=find(y); int res=0; if((int)S[x].size()<(int)S[y].size()) { for(ri i=0;i<(int)S[x].size();++i) { res=max(res,trie::query(rt1[y],a[S[x][i]-1])); trie::insert(rt2[y],a[S[x][i]-1]); trie::insert(rt1[y],a[S[x][i]]); S[y].pb(S[x][i]); } } else { for(ri i=0;i<(int)S[y].size();++i) { res=max(res,trie::query(rt2[x],a[S[y][i]])); trie::insert(rt2[x],a[S[y][i]-1]); trie::insert(rt1[x],a[S[y][i]]); S[x].pb(S[y][i]); } swap(S[x],S[y]); swap(rt1[y],rt1[x]); swap(rt2[x],rt2[y]); } ft[x]=y; trie::clear(rt1[x]); trie::clear(rt2[x]); return res;}inline int merge2(int x,int y) { x=find(x),y=find(y); int res=0; if((int)S[x].size()<(int)S[y].size()) { for(ri i=0;i<(int)S[x].size();++i) { res=max(res,trie::query(rt1[y],a[S[x][i]-1])); trie::insert(rt2[y],a[S[x][i]-1]); trie::insert(rt1[y],a[S[x][i]]); S[y].pb(S[x][i]); } swap(S[x],S[y]); swap(rt1[x],rt1[y]); swap(rt2[x],rt2[y]); } else { for(ri i=0;i<(int)S[y].size();++i) { res=max(res,trie::query(rt2[x],a[S[y][i]])); trie::insert(rt2[x],a[S[y][i]-1]); trie::insert(rt1[x],a[S[y][i]]); S[x].pb(S[y][i]); } } ft[y]=x; trie::clear(rt1[y]); trie::clear(rt2[y]); return res;}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) a[i]=read()^a[i-1],ft[i]=i; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) ps[i]=read(); for(ri i=n;i;--i) { ok[ps[i]]=1; res[i]=res[i+1]; res[i]=max(res[i],a[ps[i]]^a[ps[i]-1]); S[ps[i]].pb(ps[i]); trie::insert(rt1[ps[i]],a[ps[i]]),trie::insert(rt2[ps[i]],a[ps[i]-1]); if(ok[ps[i]-1]) res[i]=max(res[i],merge1(ps[i]-1,ps[i])); if(ok[ps[i]+1]) res[i]=max(res[i],merge2(ps[i],ps[i]+1)); } for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) cout<<res[i]<<'
'; return 0;} E 考虑把学生区间按照单调性去掉一些肯定不优的（即如果其两维都小于等于某个其后面的学生那么直接删掉这个学生） 然后用 fi,jf_{i,j}fi,j​ 表示当前处理了前 iii 个教授，前 jjj 个学生的最优情况 直接转是 O(nm2)O(nm^2)O(nm2) 的，但发现学生转移的有个东西可以前缀优化，然后变成 O(nm)O(nm)O(nm) 的了 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}const int N=1e5+5;pii a[N],b[N];int n,m,sig=0,f[2][N],cur=0;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) a[i].fi=read(),a[i].se=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i) b[i].fi=read(),b[i].se=read(); sort(a+1,a+n+1); sort(b+1,b+m+1),reverse(b+1,b+m+1); for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i) if(!sig||b[i].se>b[sig].se) b[++sig]=b[i]; m=sig,reverse(b+1,b+m+1); cur=0; for(ri i=0;i<=n;++i) { cur^=1; f[cur][0]=i?max(f[cur^1][0],a[i].fi)+a[i].se:0; for(ri pre=0x3f3f3f3f,j=1;j<=m;++j) { f[cur][j]=0x3f3f3f3f; if(i) f[cur][j]=min(f[cur][j],max(f[cur^1][j],a[i].fi)+a[i].se); f[cur][j]=min(f[cur][j],max(f[cur][j-1],b[j].fi)+b[j].se); pre=max(pre,b[j].fi+b[j].se); f[cur][j]=min(f[cur][j],pre); pre=min(pre,max(f[cur][j-1],b[j].fi)+b[j].se); } } cout<<f[cur][m]; return 0;} F 神仙分类讨论题 先找出最小值，假设分在 AAA 组，然后迭代构造一组可行解出来，具体细节可以看看题解，大概就是判一堆东西 细节多的去世，博主有个小细节调了贼久 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; }}using namespace modular;const int N=2e5+5;int all,res[N],swp[N];map<pii,vector<int> >S;typedef map<pii,vector<int> >::iterator It;vector<vector<int> >seq;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt) { all=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=all;++i) swp[i]=res[i]=0; S.clear(),seq.clear(); int ans=2; pii tmp=pii(-0x3f3f3f3f,0x3f3f3f3f); int id=0; for(ri i=1,x,y;i<=all;++i) { x=read(),y=read(); if(tmp.se>y||(y==tmp.se&&x>tmp.fi)) tmp=pii(x,y),id=i; S[pii(x,y)].pb(i); if((int)S[pii(x,y)].size()==2) swp[S[pii(x,y)][0]]=i,Mul(ans,2); } int n=tmp.fi+1,m=all-n,A=1,B=0; seq.pb(vector<int>(1,id)); S[tmp].pop_back(); if((int)S[tmp].size()==0) S.erase(tmp); while(A<n||B<m) { int id1=0,id2=0; if(S.count(pii(n-A-1,B))) id1=S[pii(n-A-1,B)].back(); if(S.count(pii(m-B-1,A))) id2=S[pii(m-B-1,A)].back(); if(id1&&id2) { if(A<B) { res[id2]=1,S[pii(m-B-1,A)].pop_back(); if(!(int)S[pii(m-B-1,A)].size()) S.erase(pii(m-B-1,A)); ++B; seq.back().pb(id2); continue; } else if(A>B) { res[id1]=0,S[pii(n-A-1,B)].pop_back(); if(!(int)S[pii(n-A-1,B)].size()) S.erase(pii(n-A-1,B)); ++A; seq.back().pb(id1); continue; } else { if(n==m) Mul(ans,2),seq.pb(vector<int>(0)); if(n>=m) { res[id1]=0,S[pii(n-A-1,B)].pop_back(); if(!(int)S[pii(n-A-1,B)].size()) S.erase(pii(n-A-1,B)); ++A; seq.back().pb(id1); continue; } else { res[id2]=1,S[pii(m-B-1,A)].pop_back(); if(!(int)S[pii(m-B-1,A)].size()) S.erase(pii(m-B-1,A)); ++B; seq.back().pb(id2); continue; } } } else if(id1) { res[id1]=0,S[pii(n-A-1,B)].pop_back(); if(!(int)S[pii(n-A-1,B)].size()) S.erase(pii(n-A-1,B)); ++A; seq.back().pb(id1); continue; } else { res[id2]=1,S[pii(m-B-1,A)].pop_back(); if(!(int)S[pii(m-B-1,A)].size()) S.erase(pii(m-B-1,A)); ++B; seq.back().pb(id2); continue; } } for(ri i=0;i<(int)seq.size();++i) { sort(seq[i].begin(),seq[i].end()); int ps=0; while(ps<(int)seq[i].size()&&swp[seq[i][ps]]) ++ps; if(ps<(int)seq[i].size()&&res[seq[i][ps]]) for(ri j=0;j<(int)seq[i].size();++j) res[seq[i][j]]^=1; } for(ri i=1;i<=all;++i) if(swp[i]) res[i]=0,res[swp[i]]=1; cout<<ans<<'
'; for(ri i=1;i<=all;++i) cout<<res[i]; puts(""); } return 0;}

posts.title: CodeForces 1270 简要题解
posts.text:
A 模拟 CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s) { int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}using namespace modular;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt) { int mx1=0,mx2=0,n,a,b; n=read(),a=read(),b=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=a;++i) mx1=max(mx1,read()); for(ri i=1;i<=b;++i) mx2=max(mx2,read()); cout<<(mx1>mx2?"YES":"NO")<<'
'; } return 0;} B 想复杂了。。。 直接看是否有 ∣ai−ai+1∣>1|a_i-a_{i+1}|>1∣ai​−ai+1​∣>1 即可 我是用了个 sb 做法，大概是拆式子拆成 ar−r+l−al≥1a_r-r+l-a_l\ge1ar​−r+l−al​≥1 ，然后 O(n)O(n)O(n) 维护前缀 max ， reverse 之后再做一次（然而比赛交代码的时候不小心把 reverse 一起删了。 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s) { int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}using namespace modular;const int N=2e5+5;int n;ll a[N];int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt) { n=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) a[i]=read(); ll mx=0,mxps=0,l=0,r=0; bool ff=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) { if(mxps==0||i-a[i]>mx) mx=i-a[i],mxps=i; if(mx+a[i]-i>=1) { l=mxps,r=i; ff=1; break; } } if(ff) { puts("YES"); cout<<l<<' '<<r<<'
'; continue; } mxps=0; ff=0; reverse(a+1,a+n+1); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) { if(mxps==0||i-a[i]>mx) mx=i-a[i],mxps=i; if(mx+a[i]-i>=1) { l=n-i+1,r=n-mxps+1; ff=1; break; } } if(ff) { puts("YES"); cout<<l<<' '<<r<<'
'; continue; } puts("NO"); } return 0;} C 又想复杂了。。。 貌似直接输出 sum+xorsum+xorsum+xor 和 xorxorxor 就秒了。 然后我莽了个数位做法，不想看的用上面的做法吧 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s) { int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}using namespace modular;const int N=1e5+5;int n;ll vl[N],x,y,a,b,c;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt) { n=read(); x=y=a=b=c=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) vl[i]=read(),x+=vl[i],y^=vl[i]; ll _x=x,_y=y; for(ri v1,v2,i=0;i<63;++i) { v1=x>>i&1,v2=y>>i&1; if(v1) { if(v2) { x+=1ll<<(i+2); x-=1ll<<i; a^=1ll<<i; b^=1ll<<i; c^=1ll<<i; continue; } else { a^=1ll<<i; continue; } } else { if(!v2) continue; a^=1ll<<i; b^=1ll<<i; } } cout<<3<<'
'; cout<<a<<' '<<b<<' '<<c<<'
'; } return 0;} D 考虑先问出 [1,k] 中的第 m 大，然后按照类似于维护动态重心的方式即可查出答案 CODE #include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() getchar()inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s) { int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}using namespace modular;const int N=505;int n,K,ps,vl,cnt1,cnt2;bool ok[N];int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai #endif n=read(),K=read(); if(K==1) { cout<<"! 1"; cout<<endl<<endl; return 0; } cout<<"? "; for(ri i=1;i<=K;++i) { cout<<i; if(i!=K) cout<<' '; } cout<<endl<<endl; ps=read(),vl=read(); int _ps=ps==1?2:1,chk=-1; cnt1=0,cnt2=0; for(ri t,v,x=K+1;x<=n;++x) { cout<<"? "; for(ri i=1;i<=K;++i) if(i!=_ps) cout<<i<<' '; cout<<x; cout<<endl<<endl; t=read(),v=read(); if(t==ps) { ok[x]=1; continue; } else { if(v>vl) chk=0; else chk=1; continue; } } cnt1=1; for(ri t,v,x=1;x<=K;++x) { if(x==_ps||x==ps) continue; cout<<"? "; for(ri i=1;i<=K;++i) if(i!=x) cout<<i<<' '; cout<<K+1; cout<<endl<<endl; t=read(),v=read(); if(ok[K+1]) { if(t==ps) { ++cnt1; } else { ++cnt2; if(v<vl) chk=0; else chk=1; } } else { if(t==ps) { ++cnt2; } else { ++cnt1; if(v>vl) chk=0; else chk=1; } } } int t,v; if(chk==-1) { if(ok[K+1]) { int pss=0; for(ri i=K+1;i<=n;++i) if(!ok[i]) { pss=i; break; } if(!pss) { cout<<"? "; for(ri i=1;i<=K;++i) if(i!=ps) cout<<i<<' '; cout<<K+1<<' '; cout<<endl<<endl; t=read(),v=read(); if(v<vl) chk=0; else chk=1; } else { for(ri i=1;i<=K;++i) if(i!=ps) cout<<i<<' '; cout<<ps<<' '; cout<<endl<<endl; t=read(),v=read(); if(v>vl) chk=0; else chk=1; } } } cout<<"! "<<(chk?K-cnt1:cnt1+1); cout<<endl<<endl; return 0;} E 想了个很咸的做法，由于太复杂比赛的时候没实现完现在也没心思修锅了 考虑正解，显然按照距离平方的奇偶分组，如果两点的横纵坐标和奇偶性相同就能分到一组，这样一定合法 但可能是所有点的奇偶性都一样，因此如果全部点横纵坐标和都相同的时候进行如下调整： 同为奇数，那么整体给横坐标/纵坐标-1 同为偶数，那么整体把 (x,y)(x,y)(x,y) 变成 (x+y2,x−y2)( rac{x+y}2, rac{x-y}2)(2x+y​,2x−y​) 这样等于关系没有变化，但一定能调整出结果 复杂度 O(n)O(n)O(n) 但由于 spj 没法 O(n)O(n)O(n) 因此出了 O(n2)O(n^2)O(n2) 的数据范围，即使这样我也被区分了。 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() getchar()inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); bool f=1; while(!isdigit(ch)) f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}const int N=1005;pii a[N];int n;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) a[i].fi=read(),a[i].se=read(); while(1) { bool ff1=1,ff2=1; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) if((a[i].fi^a[i].se)&1) ff1=0;else ff2=0; if(!(ff1||ff2)) break; if(ff1) for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) --a[i].fi; else for(ri i=1,a0,a1;i<=n;++i) a0=a[i].fi,a1=a[i].se,a[i].fi=(a0+a1)>>1,a[i].se=(a0-a1)>>1; } vector<int>res; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) if((a[i].fi^a[i].se)&1) res.pb(i); cout<<(int)res.size()<<'
'; for(ri i=0;i<(int)res.size();++i) cout<<res[i]<<' '; return 0;} F 考虑要求的是 ∑l=1n∑r=ln[r−(l−1)=K(cntr−cntl−1)]\sum\limits_{l=1}^n\sum\limits_{r=l}^n[r-(l-1)=K(cnt_r-cnt_{l-1})]l=1∑n​r=l∑n​[r−(l−1)=K(cntr​−cntl−1​)] 听U群神仙讲评后发现这玩意儿能根号分治，于是做完了 CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879#include<bits/stdc++.h>#include<tr1/unordered_map>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() getchar()inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); bool f=1; while(!isdigit(ch)) f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s) { int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}const int N=2e5+5;char s[N];int n,nxt[N],blo,pre[N];tr1::unordered_map<ll,int> cnt;inline ll C2(int x) { return (ll)x*(x-1)>>1; }int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=Read(s),blo=min(n,150); for(ri i=n,nxt_=n+1;i;--i) { if(s[i]=='1') nxt_=i; nxt[i]=nxt_; } for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) pre[i]=pre[i-1]+(s[i]=='1'); ll res=0; for(ri t=1;t<=blo;++t) { cnt.clear(); for(ri i=0;i<=n;++i) ++cnt[i-pre[i]*t]; for(tr1::unordered_map<ll,int>::iterator it=cnt.begin();it!=cnt.end();++it) res+=C2(it->se); } for(ri r,len,l=1,tm;l<=n;++l) { tm=1; r=nxt[l]; while(r<=n&&l-1+tm*blo<=n) { len=(nxt[r+1]-l)/tm; res+=max(0,len-max(blo,(r-l)/tm)); r=nxt[r+1],++tm; } } cout<<res; return 0;} G 这题明显比E简单 发现可以拆成两个数列 A=(1,2,...,n)A=(1,2,...,n)A=(1,2,...,n) 和 B=(1−a1,2−a2,...,n−an)B=(1-a_1,2-a_2,...,n-a_n)B=(1−a1​,2−a2​,...,n−an​) 这样 Bi∈[1,n]B_i\in[1,n]Bi​∈[1,n] 然后要选出若干下标使得 ∑Ai=∑Bi\sum\limits A_i=\sum\limits B_i∑Ai​=∑Bi​ 那么假如选了第 iii 个位置，考虑选第 BiB_iBi​ 个位置使得 ABiA_{B_i}ABi​​ 跟 BiB_iBi​ 抵消，这样我们又要选 BABiB_{A_{B_i}}BABi​​​ 这个位置，这样选下去就会形成一个满足题意的环 CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879#include<bits/stdc++.h>#include<tr1/unordered_map>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() getchar()inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); bool f=1; while(!isdigit(ch)) f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s) { int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}const int N=1e6+5;int n,nxt[N],du[N],que[N],hd,tl;bool vs[N];int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt) { n=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) du[i]=vs[i]=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) nxt[i]=i-read(),++du[nxt[i]]; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) if(!du[i]) que[++tl]=i; while(hd<=tl) { int x=que[hd++]; vs[x]=1; --du[nxt[x]]; if(!du[nxt[x]]) que[++tl]=nxt[x]; } for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) if(!vs[i]) { vector<int>res; while(!vs[i]) { res.pb(i); vs[i]=1; i=nxt[i]; } cout<<(int)res.size()<<'
'; for(ri i=0;i<(int)res.size();++i) cout<<res[i]<<' '; puts(""); break; } } return 0;} H 想了贼久都不会做的神仙题 考虑每个连通块一定是一个子区间，假设最后划分成了 [l1,r1],[l2,r2],...,[ln,rn][l_1,r_1],[l_2,r_2],...,[l_n,r_n][l1​,r1​],[l2​,r2​],...,[ln​,rn​] 那么满足 max1≥min1≥max2≥min2≥⋯≥maxn≥minnmax_1 \ge min_1\ge max_2\ge min_2\ge\cdots\ge max_n\ge min_nmax1​≥min1​≥max2​≥min2​≥⋯≥maxn​≥minn​ 也就是说，最后的段数等于满足 min⁡[1,i]≥max⁡[i+1,n]\min[1,i]\ge\max[i+1,n]min[1,i]≥max[i+1,n] 的 iii 的数量 然后再进行一个神仙转化，发现对于一个数 HHH ，我们构造一个数列 b=(a1≥H,a2≥H,...,an≥H)b=(a_1\ge H,a_2\ge H,...,a_n\ge H)b=(a1​≥H,a2​≥H,...,an​≥H) ，那么最后如果这个数列满足条件那么一定是 11⋯100⋯011\cdots100\cdots011⋯100⋯0 这样的，于是我们对于所有 HHH 维护其对应 bbb 数列的 bi≠bi+1b_i
ot=b_{i+1}bi​​=bi+1​ 数量，发现每次修改 aia_iai​ 会对一段连续的 HHH 产生 ±1\pm1±1 的影响，用线段树维护即可 CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485868788899091929394959697#include<bits/stdc++.h>#include<tr1/unordered_map>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() getchar()inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); bool f=1; while(!isdigit(ch)) f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}const int N=1e6+5;int n,m,a[N];bool vs[N];namespace sgt { #define lc (p<<1) #define rc (p<<1|1) #define mid (l+r>>1) int mn[N<<2],ct[N<<2],tg[N<<2]; inline void pushnow(int p,int v) { tg[p]+=v,mn[p]+=v; } inline void pushdown(int p) { if(tg[p]) pushnow(lc,tg[p]),pushnow(rc,tg[p]),tg[p]=0; } inline void pushup(int p) { mn[p]=min(mn[lc],mn[rc]); ct[p]=(mn[lc]==mn[p]?ct[lc]:0)+(mn[rc]==mn[p]?ct[rc]:0); } inline void build(int p,int l,int r) { mn[p]=0x3f3f3f3f,ct[p]=tg[p]=0; if(l==r) { if(vs[l]) mn[p]=0; ct[p]=1; return; } build(lc,l,mid),build(rc,mid+1,r); pushup(p); } inline void update(int p,int l,int r,int ql,int qr,int v) { if(ql<=l&&r<=qr) return pushnow(p,v); pushdown(p); if(qr<=mid) update(lc,l,mid,ql,qr,v); else if(ql>mid) update(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr,v); else update(lc,l,mid,ql,qr,v),update(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr,v); pushup(p); } #undef lc #undef rc #undef mid}const int L=0,R=1e6;inline void update(int ps,int coe) { sgt::update(1,L,R,min(a[ps],a[ps-1]),max(a[ps],a[ps-1])-1,coe); }int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(); a[0]=1000001,a[n+1]=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) a[i]=read(),vs[a[i]]=1; sgt::build(1,L,R); for(ri i=1;i<=n+1;++i) update(i,1); for(ri i=1,ps,vl;i<=m;++i) { ps=read(),vl=read(); update(ps,-1),update(ps+1,-1); sgt::update(1,L,R,a[ps],a[ps],0x3f3f3f3f); a[ps]=vl; sgt::update(1,L,R,a[ps],a[ps],-0x3f3f3f3f); update(ps,1),update(ps+1,1); cout<<sgt::ct[1]<<'
'; } return 0;} I 神仙构造题！ 假设当前对 (x,y)(x,y)(x,y) 操作会影响 (x+xi−x1,x+yi−y1)(x+x_i-x_1,x+y_i-y_1)(x+xi​−x1​,x+yi​−y1​) 的 aaa 值，那么构造函数 fx,y=⊕ax−(xi−x1),y−(yi−y1)f_{x,y}=\oplus a_{x-(x_i-x_1),y-(y_i-y_1)}fx,y​=⊕ax−(xi​−x1​),y−(yi​−y1​)​ ，这样如果对 (x,y)(x,y)(x,y) 操作就等价于影响 (x+2(xi−x1),y+2(yi−y1))(x+2(x_i-x_1),y+2(y_i-y_1))(x+2(xi​−x1​),y+2(yi​−y1​)) 的 fff 值，那么就相当于构造出了新图，每次位移的向量从 (xi−x1,yi−y1)(x_i-x_1,y_i-y_1)(xi​−x1​,yi​−y1​) 变成了 (2(xi−x1),2(yi,y1))(2(x_i-x_1),2(y_i,y_1))(2(xi​−x1​),2(yi​,y1​)) ，显然在 kkk 轮之后所有向量在模意义下是等价的，因此只需要看 kkk 轮之后需要被异或的位置的数量即可 CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758#include<bits/stdc++.h>#include<tr1/unordered_map>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() getchar()inline ll readl() { ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}int n,m;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=1<<readl(); vector<vector<ll> >a(n,vector<ll>(n)); for(ri i=0;i<n;++i) for(ri j=0;j<n;++j) a[i][j]=readl(); m=readl(); vector<pii>dt(m); for(ri i=0;i<m;++i) dt[i].fi=readl(),dt[i].se=readl(); for(ri i=1;i<m;++i) dt[i].fi-=dt[0].fi,dt[i].se-=dt[0].se; dt[0]=pii(0,0); for(ri t=1;t<=n;t<<=1) { vector<vector<ll> >cur(n,vector<ll>(n)); for(ri i=0;i<n;++i) for(ri j=0;j<n;++j) { cur[i][j]=0; for(ri k=0;k<m;++k) cur[i][j]^=a[((i-dt[k].fi)%n+n)%n][((j-dt[k].se)%n+n)%n]; } a=cur; for(ri i=0;i<m;++i) dt[i].fi<<=1,dt[i].se<<=1; } int res=0; for(ri i=0;i<n;++i) for(ri j=0;j<n;++j) if(a[i][j]) ++res; cout<<res; return 0;}

posts.title: 杂题乱做 Round13
posts.text:
Transforming Sequence 解题思路： 首先假如 n>kn>kn>k 一定不合法，那么判断之后一定有 n≤kn\le kn≤k 考虑设 fi,jf_{i,j}fi,j​ 表示前 iii 个数占用了 jjj 个整数位的方案数，这样可以列出转移式： fi,j=∑k≤jfi−1,k(jk)2kf_{i,j}=\sum\limits_{k\le j}f_{i-1,k} inom{j}{k}2^{k}fi,j​=k≤j∑​fi−1,k​(kj​)2k 然后就可以 dp 递推啦！ 然后你就 TLE 了。 仔细观察发现这个转移跟第一维关系不大，因此可以考虑倍增优化 DP ，假设 X+Y=iX+Y=iX+Y=i 那么 fi,j=∑k<jfX,k(jk)2kXfY,j−kf_{i,j}=\sum\limits_{k<j}f_{X,k} inom{j}{k}2^{kX}f_{Y,j-k}fi,j​=k<j∑​fX,k​(kj​)2kXfY,j−k​ ，然后这个可以直接 fft 搞，由于模数的原因莽一发 mtt 即可 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127128129130131#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}using namespace modular;struct cp { double x,y; cp(double x=0,double y=0):x(x),y(y) {} friend inline cp operator+(cp a,cp b) { return cp(a.x+b.x,a.y+b.y); } friend inline void operator+=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a+b; } friend inline cp operator-(cp a,cp b) { return cp(a.x-b.x,a.y-b.y); } friend inline void operator-=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a-b; } friend inline cp operator*(cp a,cp b) { return cp(a.x*b.x-a.y*b.y,a.x*b.y+a.y*b.x); } friend inline void operator*=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a*b; } friend inline cp operator*(cp a,double b) { return cp(a.x*b,a.y*b); } friend inline void operator*=(cp&a,double b) { a=a*b; } friend inline cp operator/(cp a,double b) { return cp(a.x/b,a.y/b); } friend inline void operator/=(cp&a,double b) { a=a/b; } inline cp operator~() const { return cp(x,-y); }};typedef vector<cp> polyr;const int blo=(1<<15)-1;int lim,tim;vector<cp> w[20];vector<int> rev[20];const double pi=acos(-1.0);inline void init_fft() { w[19].resize(1<<19); for(ri i=0,lm=1<<19;i<lm;++i) w[19][i]=cp(cos(pi/lm*i),sin(pi/lm*i)); for(ri i=18;~i;--i) { w[i].resize(1<<i); for(ri j=0,lm=1<<i;j<lm;++j) w[i][j]=w[i+1][j<<1]; }}inline void init(int up) { lim=1,tim=0; while(lim<up) lim<<=1,++tim; if(rev[tim].size()) return; rev[tim].resize(lim); for(ri i=1;i<lim;++i) rev[tim][i]=(rev[tim][i>>1]>>1)|((i&1)<<(tim-1));}inline void fft(polyr&a,int typ) { for(ri i=1;i<lim;++i) if(i<rev[tim][i]) swap(a[i],a[rev[tim][i]]); cp a0,a1; for(ri i=1,t=0;i<lim;i<<=1,++t) for(ri j=0;j<lim;j+=i<<1) for(ri k=0;k<i;++k) { a0=a[j+k],a1=a[j+k+i]*w[t][k]; a[j+k]=a0+a1,a[j+k+i]=a0-a1; } if(~typ) return; reverse(++a.begin(),a.end()); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) a[i]/=lim;}inline poly operator*(poly a,poly b) { int n=(int)a.size(),m=(int)b.size(),t=n+m-1; poly c(t); init(t); polyr A(lim),B(lim),P(lim),Q(lim); for(ri i=0;i<n;++i) A[i]=cp(a[i]>>15,a[i]&blo); for(ri i=0;i<m;++i) B[i]=cp(b[i]>>15,b[i]&blo); fft(A,1),fft(B,1); cp cur[4]; for(ri i=0,j=0;i<lim;++i,j=j?j-1:lim-1) { cur[0]=(A[i]+(~A[j]))*cp(0.5,0); cur[1]=((~A[j])-A[i])*cp(0,0.5); cur[2]=(B[i]+(~B[j]))*cp(0.5,0); cur[3]=((~B[j])-B[i])*cp(0,0.5); P[i]=cur[0]*cur[2]+cp(0,1)*cur[1]*cur[3]; Q[i]=cur[0]*cur[3]+cp(0,1)*cur[1]*cur[2]; } fft(P,-1),fft(Q,-1); ll cr[4]; for(ri i=0;i<t;++i) { cr[0]=(ll)(P[i].x+0.5)%mod; cr[1]=(ll)(P[i].y+0.5)%mod; cr[2]=(ll)(Q[i].x+0.5)%mod; cr[3]=(ll)(Q[i].y+0.5)%mod; c[i]=((cr[0]<<30)+(cr[2]+cr[3]<<15)+cr[1])%mod; } return c;}const int N=30005;ll n;int fac[N],ifac[N],K,pw1[N<<1],pw2[N<<1];inline int getpw(int x) { return mul(pw1[x%blo],pw2[x/blo]); };inline void init() { fac[0]=fac[1]=ifac[0]=ifac[1]=1; for(ri i=2;i<=K;++i) { fac[i]=mul(fac[i-1],i); ifac[i]=mul(ifac[mod-mod/i*i],mod-mod/i); } for(ri i=2;i<=K;++i) Mul(ifac[i],ifac[i-1]); pw1[0]=pw2[0]=1; for(ri i=1;i<=blo;++i) pw1[i]=add(pw1[i-1],pw1[i-1]); for(ri i=1;i<=blo;++i) pw2[i]=mul(pw2[i-1],pw1[blo]);}inline int C(int n,int m) { return n<m||m<0?0:mul(fac[n],mul(ifac[m],ifac[n-m])); }inline poly poly_mul(poly a,poly b,int len) { for(ri i=0,n=(int)a.size();i<n;++i) Mul(a[i],getpw((ll)i*len%(mod-1))); return a*b;}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif cin>>n>>K; if(n>K) return cout<<0,0; init(),init_fft(); poly res,a(K+1); for(ri i=1;i<=K;++i) a[i]=ifac[i]; res=a,--n; for(ri len=1;n;n>>=1,a=poly_mul(a,a,len),a.resize(K+1),len<<=1) if(n&1) { res=poly_mul(res,a,len); res.resize(K+1); } int ss=0; for(ri i=0;i<=K;++i) Add(ss,mul(res[i],ifac[K-i])); cout<<mul(ss,fac[K]); return 0;} 射命丸文的笔记 解题思路： 考虑竞赛图的性质，由于缩了图之后一定是链状，因此考虑枚举链尾的集合即可计算答案，设 fif_ifi​ 表示 iii 个点答案，那么有 fi=2(i2)−∑j=1ifj(ij)2(j2)f_i=2^{ inom{i}2}-\sum\limits_{j=1}^if_j inom{i}{j}2^{ inom j2}fi​=2(2i​)−j=1∑i​fj​(ji​)2(2j​) ，多项式求逆即可 CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283848586#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;namespace modular { const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}using namespace modular;int lim,tim,invv[23],w[23];vector<int>rev[23];inline void init_ntt() { invv[0]=1; for(ri i=1,iv=mod+1>>1;i<23;++i) invv[i]=mul(invv[i-1],iv); w[22]=ksm(3,(mod-1)>>23); for(ri i=21;~i;--i) w[i]=mul(w[i+1],w[i+1]);}inline void init(int up) { lim=1,tim=0; while(lim<up) lim<<=1,++tim; if(rev[tim].size()) return; rev[tim].resize(lim); for(ri i=1;i<lim;++i) rev[tim][i]=(rev[tim][i>>1]>>1)|((i&1)<<(tim-1));}inline void ntt(poly&a,int typ) { for(ri i=1;i<lim;++i) if(i<rev[tim][i]) swap(a[i],a[rev[tim][i]]); for(ri i=1,t=0,a0,a1,mt;i<lim;i<<=1,++t) for(ri j=0;j<lim;j+=i<<1) { mt=1; for(ri k=0;k<i;++k,Mul(mt,w[t])) { a0=a[j+k],a1=mul(a[j+k+i],mt); a[j+k]=add(a0,a1),a[j+k+i]=dec(a0,a1); } } if(~typ) return; reverse(++a.begin(),a.end()); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) Mul(a[i],invv[tim]); }inline poly poly_inv(poly a,int K) { poly b(1,Inv(a[0])),c; for(ri i=1;i<K;i<<=1) { init(i<<2); b.resize(lim),ntt(b,1); c=a,c.resize(i<<1),c.resize(lim),ntt(c,1); for(ri j=0;j<lim;++j) Mul(b[j],dec(2,mul(b[j],c[j]))); ntt(b,-1),b.resize(i<<1); } return b.resize(K),b;}const int N=100005;int n,fac[N],ifac[N],pw1[1<<15|5],pw2[1<<15|5],md=(1<<15)-1;inline int getpw(int x) { return mul(pw1[x&md],pw2[x>>15]); }inline void init() { fac[0]=fac[1]=ifac[0]=ifac[1]=1; for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i) { fac[i]=mul(fac[i-1],i); ifac[i]=mul(ifac[mod-mod/i*i],mod-mod/i); } for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i) Mul(ifac[i],ifac[i-1]); pw1[0]=pw2[0]=1; inv[1]=1; for(ri i=2,up=1<<20;i<up;++i) inv[i]=mul(inv[mod-mod/i*i],mod-mod/i);}inline void init(int up) { lim=1,tim=0; while(lim<up) lim<<=1,++tim; if(rev[tim].size()) return; rev[tim].resize(lim); for(ri i=1;i<lim;++i) rev[tim][i]=(rev[tim][i>>1]>>1)|((i&1)<<(tim-1));}inline void ntt(poly&a,int typ) { for(ri i=1;i<lim;++i) if(i<rev[tim][i]) swap(a[i],a[rev[tim][i]]); for(ri i=1,t=0,a0,a1;i<lim;i<<=1,++t) for(ri j=0;j<lim;j+=i<<1) { for(ri k=0;k<i;++k) { a0=a[j+k],a1=mul(a[j+k+i],w[t][k]); a[j+k]=add(a0,a1),a[j+k+i]=dec(a0,a1); } } if(~typ) return; reverse(++a.begin(),a.end()); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) Mul(a[i],invv[tim]);}inline poly operator*(poly a,poly b) { int n=(int)a.size(),m=(int)b.size(),t=n+m-1; if(t<=128) { poly c(t); for(ri i=0;i<n;++i) if(a[i]) for(ri j=0;j<m;++j) Add(c[i+j],mul(a[i],b[j])); return c; } init(t); a.resize(lim),ntt(a,1); b.resize(lim),ntt(b,1); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) Mul(a[i],b[i]); return ntt(a,-1),a.resize(t),a;}inline poly operator-(poly a,poly b) { int n=(int)b.size(); if((int)a.size()<n) a.resize(n); for(ri i=0;i<n;++i) Dec(a[i],b[i]); return a;}inline poly poly_inv(poly a,int K) { poly b(1,Inv(a[0])),c; for(ri i=1;i<K;i<<=1) { init(i*3); b.resize(lim),ntt(b,1); c=a,c.resize(i<<1),c.resize(lim),ntt(c,1); for(ri j=0;j<lim;++j) Mul(b[j],dec(2,mul(b[j],c[j]))); ntt(b,-1),b.resize(i<<1); } return b.resize(K),b;}inline poly poly_deriv(poly a) { for(ri i=1,up=(int)a.size();i<up;++i) a[i-1]=mul(a[i],i); return a.pop_back(),a;}inline poly poly_integ(poly a) { a.pb(0); for(ri i=(int)a.size()-1;i;--i) a[i]=mul(inv[i],a[i-1]); return a[0]=0,a;}inline poly poly_ln(poly a,int K) { return a=poly_inv(a,K)*poly_deriv(a),a.resize(K-1),poly_integ(a); }inline poly poly_exp(poly a,int K) { poly b(1,1),c; for(ri i=1;i<K;i<<=1) { c=a,c.resize(i<<1),Add(c[0],1); b=b*(c-poly_ln(b,i<<1)),b.resize(i<<1); } return b.resize(K),b;}const int N=1e5+5;int fac[N],ifac[N],f[N];inline int C(int n,int m) { return n<m||m<0?0:mul(fac[n],mul(ifac[m],ifac[n-m])); }inline void init() { fac[0]=fac[1]=ifac[0]=ifac[1]=1; for(ri i=2;i<=100000;++i) { fac[i]=mul(fac[i-1],i); ifac[i]=mul(ifac[i-1],inv[i]); }}poly F;inline void init_F() { F.resize(100001); for(ri i=1;i<=100000;++i) F[i]=ifac[i]; F=poly_exp(F,100001); for(ri i=0;i<=100000;++i) Mul(F[i],fac[i]);}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif init_ntt(); init(); init_F(); for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt) cout<<F[read()]<<'
'; return 0;} WD与积木 解题思路： 考虑非空集合生成函数为 ex−1e^x-1ex−1 ，设 FFF 为分母生成函数， GGG 为分子生成函数 那么显然有 F=∑i=0+∞(ex−1)ii!i!=11−(ex−1)=12−exF=\sum\limits_{i=0}^{+\infty} rac{(e^x-1)^i}{i!}i!= rac{1}{1-(e^x-1)}= rac1{2-e^x}F=i=0∑+∞​i!(ex−1)i​i!=1−(ex−1)1​=2−ex1​ 同理能推出 G=ex−1(2−ex)2G= rac{e^x-1}{(2-e^x)^2}G=(2−ex)2ex−1​ 然后做完了 CODE

posts.title: 杂题乱做 Round12
posts.text:
某位歌姬的故事 解题思路: 将序列离散化后，可以给每一段区间定一个最大值的最小上界，那么每一种上界的值是独立的，考虑把相同上界的块扯出来 DP 对于一种上界，把对应的段和限制提出来，对于每个块维护一个 maxlmaxlmaxl 表示处理到区间 iii 时，最后填入的一个等于上界的值所在的块标号应该不小于 maxlmaxlmaxl ，对于一个限制对应的块 [l,...,r][l,...,r][l,...,r] ，我们用 lll 更新 maxl[r]maxl[r]maxl[r] ，最后直接 DP 设 fi,jf_{i,j}fi,j​ 表示当前在第 iii 块，最后一个填的等于上界的数在第 jjj 块的方案数 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); } inline int fix(int a) { return (a%mod+mod)%mod; }}using namespace modular;template<typename T> inline void ckmin(T&a,T b) { a>b?a=b:0; }template<typename T> inline void ckmax(T&a,T b) { a<b?a=b:0; }const int N=1005;int n,m,A,seg[N],sz,vl[N],sig,a[N];struct Q { int l,r,v; friend inline bool operator<(Q a,Q b) { return a.v^b.v?a.v<b.v:(a.l^b.l?a.l<b.l:a.r<b.r); }}qry[N];inline int findps(int x) { return lower_bound(seg+1,seg+sig+1,x)-seg; }inline int findvl(int x) { return lower_bound(vl+1,vl+sz+1,x)-vl; }inline int calc(int w) { vector<int>upd,psl,f[2]; int cur=0; upd.pb(0),f[0].pb(0),f[1].pb(0),psl.pb(0); for(ri i=1;i<sig;++i) if(a[i]==w) upd.pb(i),psl.pb(0),f[0].pb(0),f[1].pb(0); for(ri l,r,i=1;i<=m;++i) if(qry[i].v==w) { if(upd.size()==1) return 0; l=lower_bound(upd.begin(),upd.end(),qry[i].l)-upd.begin(); r=lower_bound(upd.begin(),upd.end(),qry[i].r)-upd.begin()-1; ckmax(psl[r],l); } f[cur=0][0]=1; for(ri i=1,s,c1,c2,up=(int)upd.size()-1;i<=up;++i) { cur^=1; for(ri j=0;j<=i;++j) f[cur][j]=0; c1=ksm(vl[w],seg[upd[i]+1]-seg[upd[i]]),c2=ksm(vl[w]-1,seg[upd[i]+1]-seg[upd[i]]); s=0; for(ri j=psl[i];j<i;++j) if(f[cur^1][j]) Add(f[cur][j],mul(f[cur^1][j],c2)); for(ri j=0;j<i;++j) if(f[cur^1][j]) Add(s,f[cur^1][j]); f[cur][i]=mul(dec(c1,c2),s); } int res=0; for(ri i=0,up=(int)upd.size()-1;i<=up;++i) Add(res,f[cur][i]); return res;}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt) { n=read(),m=read(),A=read(); sig=sz=0; for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i) { qry[i].l=read(),qry[i].r=read()+1,qry[i].v=read(); seg[++sig]=qry[i].l,seg[++sig]=qry[i].r,vl[++sz]=qry[i].v; } seg[++sig]=1,seg[++sig]=n+1; sort(seg+1,seg+sig+1),sig=unique(seg+1,seg+sig+1)-seg-1; sort(vl+1,vl+sz+1),sz=unique(vl+1,vl+sz+1)-vl-1; for(ri i=1;i<=sig;++i) a[i]=sz+1; sort(qry+1,qry+m+1); for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i) { qry[i].l=findps(qry[i].l); qry[i].r=findps(qry[i].r); qry[i].v=findvl(qry[i].v); for(ri j=qry[i].l;j<qry[i].r;++j) ckmin(a[j],qry[i].v); } int res=1,ss=0; for(ri i=1;i<=sz;++i) { Mul(res,calc(i)); if(!res) break; } if(!res ) { puts("0");continue; } for(ri i=1;i<sig;++i) if(a[i]==sz+1) ss+=seg[i+1]-seg[i]; cout<<mul(res,ksm(A,ss))<<'
'; } return 0;} 九个太阳 解题思路: 单位根反演裸题，不用写题解了 好吧还是水一发题解吧。 Ans=∑i=0n(∑j=0K−1ωKij)(ni)=∑i=0K−1∑j=0nωKij(nj)=∑i=0K−1(ωKi+1)n egin{aligned} Ans=&\sum\limits_{i=0}^n(\sum\limits_{j=0}^{K-1}\omega_K^{ij}) inom ni\ =&\sum\limits_{i=0}^{K-1}\sum\limits_{j=0}^n\omega_K^{ij} inom nj\ =&\sum\limits_{i=0}^{K-1}(\omega_K^i+1)^n \end{aligned} Ans===​i=0∑n​(j=0∑K−1​ωKij​)(in​)i=0∑K−1​j=0∑n​ωKij​(jn​)i=0∑K−1​(ωKi​+1)n​ CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;namespace modular { const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); } inline int fix(int a) { return (a%mod+mod)%mod; }}using namespace modular;ll n;int K,omega;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif cin>>n>>K; n%=mod-1; omega=ksm(3,(mod-1)/K); int res=0; for(ri i=0,mt=1;i<K;++i,Mul(mt,omega)) Add(res,ksm(mt+1,n)); cout<<mul(res,Inv(K)); return 0;} Hard Nim 解题思路: 考虑到问题转化为求异或值为 000 的方案数，那么对于每堆石子可以选取的集合为不超过 mmm 的素数集合，发现就是个 fwtfwtfwt 快速幂 CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); } inline int fix(int a) { return (a%mod+mod)%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=50005;int n,m,pri[N],tot=0,a[N<<1];bool vs[N];inline void init() { int up=50000; for(ri i=2;i<=up;++i) { if(!vs[i]) pri[++tot]=i; for(ri j=1,lm=up/i;j<=tot&&pri[j]<=lm;++j) { vs[i*pri[j]]=1; if(i==i/pri[j]*pri[j]) break; } }}int lim;inline void fwt(int*a,int typ) { for(ri i=1,a0,a1,iv=mod+1>>1;i<lim;i<<=1) for(ri j=0,len=i<<1;j<lim;j+=len) for(ri k=0;k<i;++k) { a0=a[j+k],a1=a[j+k+i]; a[j+k]=add(a0,a1),a[j+k+i]=dec(a0,a1); if(typ==-1) Mul(a[j+k],iv),Mul(a[j+k+i],iv); }}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif init(); while(cin>>n>>m) { lim=1; while(lim<=m) lim<<=1; for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) a[i]=0; for(ri i=1;i<=tot&&pri[i]<=m;++i) a[pri[i]]=1; fwt(a,1); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) a[i]=ksm(a[i],n); fwt(a,-1); cout<<a[0]<<'
'; } return 0;} 二元运算 解题思路: 题目给出了两种互补的基础卷积方式，那么考虑分治, 发现刚好 [l,mid][l,mid][l,mid] 中所有下标小于 [mid+1,r][mid+1,r][mid+1,r] 所有下标，于是分治 fft 处理即可 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}struct cp { double a,b; cp(double a=0,double b=0):a(a),b(b) {} friend inline cp operator+(cp a,cp b) { return cp(a.a+b.a,a.b+b.b); } friend inline void operator+=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a+b; } friend inline cp operator-(cp a,cp b) { return cp(a.a-b.a,a.b-b.b); } friend inline void operator-=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a-b; } friend inline cp operator*(cp a,cp b) { return cp(a.a*b.a-a.b*b.b,a.a*b.b+a.b*b.a); } friend inline void operator*=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a*b; } friend inline cp operator/(cp a,double b) { return cp(a.a/b,a.b/b); } friend inline void operator/=(cp&a,double b) { a=a/b; }};typedef vector<cp> poly;const double pi=acos(-1.0);cp w[23];int lim,tim;vector<int>rev[23];inline void init_fft() { for(ri i=0;i<23;++i) w[i]=cp(cos(pi/(1<<i)),sin(pi/(1<<i))); }inline void init(int up) { lim=1,tim=0; while(lim<up) lim<<=1,++tim; if(rev[tim].size()) return; rev[tim].resize(lim); for(ri i=1;i<lim;++i) rev[tim][i]=(rev[tim][i>>1]>>1)|((i&1)<<(tim-1));}inline void fft(poly&a,int typ) { for(ri i=1;i<lim;++i) if(i<rev[tim][i]) swap(a[i],a[rev[tim][i]]); cp a0,a1,mt; for(ri i=1,t=0;i<lim;i<<=1,++t) for(ri j=0,len=i<<1;j<lim;j+=len) { mt=cp(1,0); for(ri k=0;k<i;++k,mt*=w[t]) { a0=a[j+k],a1=a[j+k+i]*mt; a[j+k]=a0+a1,a[j+k+i]=a0-a1; } } if(~typ) return; reverse(++a.begin(),a.end()); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) a[i]/=lim;}inline poly operator*(poly a,poly b) { int n=(int)a.size(),m=(int)b.size(),t=n+m-1; if(t<=128) { poly c(t); for(ri i=0;i<n;++i) for(ri j=0;j<m;++j) c[i+j]+=a[i]*b[j]; return c; } init(t); a.resize(lim),fft(a,1); b.resize(lim),fft(b,1); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) a[i]*=b[i]; return fft(a,-1),a.resize(t),a;}const int N=50005;int n,m,mx,q,_a[N],_b[N];poly a,b,ta,tb,tc;ll res[N<<2];inline void solve(int l,int r) { if(l==r) { res[0]+=((ll)(a[l].a+0.5))*((ll)(b[l].a+0.5)); return; } int mid=l+r>>1; solve(l,mid),solve(mid+1,r); if(r-l+1<=256) { for(ri i=l;i<=mid;++i) for(ri j=mid+1;j<=r;++j) { res[i+j]+=((ll)(a[i].a+0.5))*((ll)(b[j].a+0.5)); res[j-i]+=((ll)(a[j].a+0.5))*((ll)(b[i].a+0.5)); } } else { ta.resize(mid-l+1),tb.resize(r-mid); for(ri i=l;i<=mid;++i) ta[i-l]=a[i]; for(ri i=mid+1;i<=r;++i) tb[i-mid-1]=b[i]; tc=ta*tb; for(ri i=0;i<(int)tc.size();++i) res[i+mid+1+l]+=(ll)(tc[i].a+0.5); for(ri i=mid+1;i<=r;++i) tb[i-mid-1]=a[i]; for(ri i=l;i<=mid;++i) ta[i-l]=b[i]; reverse(ta.begin(),ta.end()); tc=ta*tb; for(ri i=0;i<(int)tc.size();++i) res[i+1]+=(ll)(tc[i].a+0.5); }}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); freopen("own.out","w",stdout); #endif init_fft(); for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt) { n=read(),m=read(),q=read(),mx=-1; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) mx=max(mx,_a[i]=read()); for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i) mx=max(mx,_b[i]=read()); a.clear(),a.resize(mx+1); b.clear(),b.resize(mx+1); for(ri i=0;i<=(mx<<1);++i) res[i]=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) ++a[_a[i]].a; for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i) ++b[_b[i]].a; solve(0,mx); for(ri x;q;--q) { x=read(); if(x<=(mx<<1)) cout<<res[x]<<'
'; else puts("0"); } } return 0;} Lightsabers (hard) 解题思路: 可以直接对每种颜色构造形式幂级数然后做双模分治 nttnttntt 不过看到了一种神奇的启发式合并的做法 大概是每次合并两个当前度最小的多项式，复杂度仍然是 O(nlog⁡n2)O(n\log n^2)O(nlogn2) 本来听说要快一点但是由于我写的双模ntt太菜了于是被分治ntt吊着打 CODE1 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef vector<int> poly;#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}const int N=2e5+5;int n,m,K,a[N],vl[N],cnt[N],sig=0;inline int find(int x) { return lower_bound(vl+1,vl+sig+1,x)-vl; }struct Ntt { int mod,g,lim,tim,w[21],invv[21]; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); } vector<int>rev[21]; inline void init_ntt() { invv[0]=1; for(ri i=1,iv=mod+1>>1;i<21;++i) invv[i]=mul(invv[i-1],iv); w[20]=ksm(g,(mod-1)>>21); for(ri i=19;~i;--i) w[i]=mul(w[i+1],w[i+1]); cout<<solve(1,sig)[K]; return 0;} Kyoya and Train 解题思路: 考虑朴素 dp ，设 fi,Tf_{i,T}fi,T​ 表示当前在点 iii 时刻为 ttt 的最小花费 那么有显然的转移 fu,T=min⁡v{∑i=1tfv,T+i×P(u,v),i}f_{u,T}=\min\limits_v\{\sum\limits_{i=1}^tf_{v,T+i}	imes P_{(u,v),i}\}fu,T​=vmin​{i=1∑t​fv,T+i​×P(u,v),i​} 发现可以分治 fft 出边的贡献，于是 O(mtlog⁡t2)O(mt\log t^2)O(mtlogt2) 过了 我把单向边建成双向的调了一年 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; } friend inline void operator+=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a+b; } friend inline cp operator-(cp a,cp b) { return cp(a.x-b.x,a.y-b.y); } friend inline void operator-=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a-b; } friend inline cp operator*(cp a,cp b) { return cp(a.x*b.x-a.y*b.y,a.x*b.y+a.y*b.x); } friend inline void operator*=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a*b; } friend inline cp operator*(cp a,double b) { return cp(a.x*b,a.y*b); } friend inline void operator*=(cp&a,double b) { a=a*b; } friend inline cp operator/(cp a,double b) { return cp(a.x/b,a.y/b); cp a0,a1,mt; for(ri i=1,t=0;i<lim;i<<=1,++t) for(ri j=0,len=i<<1;j<lim;j+=len) { mt=cp(1,0); for(ri k=0;k<i;++k,mt*=w[t]) { a0=a[j+k],a1=a[j+k+i]*mt; a[j+k]=a0+a1,a[j+k+i]=a0-a1; } } if(~typ) return; reverse(++a.begin(),a.end()); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) a[i]/=lim;}inline poly operator*(poly a,poly b) { int n=(int)a.size(),m=(int)b.size(),t=n+m-1; init(t); a.resize(lim),fft(a,1); b.resize(lim),fft(b,1);
