init(cnt3,1,1); for(ri i=1;i+i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j)swap(s[i][j],s[n-i+1][j]); init(cnt4,0,1); int res=0; clear(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j){ Add(a[i][j],cnt3[i][j]); Dec(a[i+1][j],cnt4[i][j]); Add(a[i+1][j+1],cnt1[i][j]); Dec(a[i][j+1],cnt2[i][j]); } Add(res,solve()); clear(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j){ Add(a[i][j],cnt3[i][j]); Dec(a[i+1][j],cnt4[i][j]); Add(a[i+1][j],cnt1[i][j]); Dec(a[i][j],cnt2[i][j]); } Dec(res,solve()); clear(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j){ Add(a[i][j],cnt3[i][j]); Dec(a[i][j],cnt4[i][j]); Add(a[i][j+1],cnt1[i][j]); Dec(a[i][j+1],cnt2[i][j]); } Dec(res,solve()); clear(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j){ Add(a[i][j],cnt3[i][j]); Dec(a[i][j],cnt4[i][j]); Add(a[i][j],cnt1[i][j]); Dec(a[i][j],cnt2[i][j]); } Add(res,solve()); cout<<res; return 0;} Permuted Matrices 解题思路： 考虑只有一行的时候咋做，考虑把整个序列分成 ⌊nk⌋\lfloor rac{n}{k}floor⌊kn​⌋ 段，设 fif_ifi​ 表示前 iii 段带容斥系数的答案，然后枚举最后 jjj 段可以强制合并成一段转移即可，即 fi=∑j=1ifi−jCikjkf_{i}=\sum\limits_{j=1}^if_{i-j}C_{ik}^{jk}fi​=j=1∑i​fi−j​Cikjk​ ，加上行的限制就是把后面的组合数给行数次方，然后变个形就能上多项式搞 CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)namespace modular{ const int mod=1000000123; inline int add(int a,int b){return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;}}using namespace modular;const int N=50005;int fac[N],ifac[N],f[N],n,pre[N];inline void init(){ fac[0]=fac[1]=ifac[0]=ifac[1]=1; for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i){ fac[i]=mul(fac[i-1],i); ifac[i]=mul(ifac[mod-mod/i*i],mod-mod/i); } for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i)Mul(ifac[i],ifac[i-1]); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ fac[i]=ksm(fac[i],n); ifac[i]=ksm(ifac[i],n); }}inline int C(int n,int m){return n<m||m<0?0:mul(fac[n],mul(ifac[m],ifac[n-m]));}vector<int>a;inline int solve(){ f[0]=1; for(ri ss,pre=0,i=1;i<a.size();++i){ pre+=a[i]; f[i]=0; ss=0; for(ri j=i-1;~j;--j){ ss+=a[j+1]; if((i-j)&1)Add(f[i],mul(f[j],C(pre,ss))); else Dec(f[i],mul(f[j],C(pre,ss))); } } return f[a.size()-1];}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=50000; init(); int res=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ a.resize(1); for(ri j=n;j;j-=a.back())a.pb(min(i,j)); Add(res,solve()); } cout<<res; return 0;}

posts.title: 杂题乱做 Round6
posts.text: 随机数生成器 解题思路： 看了一下网上的解法大概是 O(nX)O(nX)O(nX) 的？其实有个 O(n2)O(n^2)O(n2) 的在这里讲一下吧 考虑用 min−maxmin-maxmin−max 容斥转化为求所有子集询问到的位置的最小值的期望，这样答案只跟所有询问覆盖的长度有关，首先考虑 nnn 个 [1,x][1,x][1,x] 间随机整数的期望最小值怎么求，考虑枚举最小值是多少以及有哪些位置是最小值然后进行变形即可，下面推一波式子： Emin=∑i=1xi∑j=1nCnj(x−i)n−jxn=∑i=1xi((x−i+1)n−(x−i)n)xn=∑i=1xinxn\begin{aligned} E_{min}=&\frac{\sum\limits_{i=1}^xi\sum\limits_{j=1}^nC_n^j(x-i)^{n-j}}{x^n}\\ =&\frac{\sum\limits_{i=1}^xi((x-i+1)^n-(x-i)^n)}{x^n}\\ =&\frac{\sum\limits_{i=1}^xi^n}{x^n} \end{aligned} Emin​===​xni=1∑x​ij=1∑n​Cnj​(x−i)n−j​xni=1∑x​i((x−i+1)n−(x−i)n)​xni=1∑x​in​​ 上式利用拉格朗日插值可以 O(n2)O(n^2)O(n2) 预处理，但由于该题的 xxx 范围跟 nnn 同阶因此代码里直接算的 那么现在只用考虑所有询问的子集对长度个数的贡献，因此考虑如下 dpdpdp ： 将所有的询问按左端点单增排序，设 fi,jf_{i,j}fi,j​ 表示当前覆盖长度为 iii ，之前被选中的询问覆盖到的最远点为 jjj 的带容斥系数方案数 假设当前询问区间为 [l,r][l,r][l,r] ，长度为 lenlenlen ，这样对于所有状态有如下三种转移： fi+len,r←(−1)fi,j<lf_{i+len,r}\leftarrow(-1)f_{i,j<l}fi+len,r​←(−1)fi,j<l​ ，维护一个行前缀和可以很快求 fi+r−j,r←(−1)fi,l≤j<rf_{i+r-j,r}\leftarrow(-1)f_{i,l\le j<r}fi+r−j,r​←(−1)fi,l≤j<r​ ,维护一个对角线前缀和可以很快求 fi,j←(−1)fi,jf_{i,j}\leftarrow(-1)f_{i,j}fi,j​←(−1)fi,j​ ，要求支持一个区间清零？？？ 经过讨论发现可以用线段树优化 dpdpdp ，复杂度为 O(n2log⁡n)O(n^2\log n)O(n2logn) ，能过但复杂度貌似不太优秀 CODE #include<bits/stdc++.h>#include<tr1/unordered_map>#define ri register int#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef pair<ll,int> pli;typedef pair<int,ll> pil;typedef unsigned long long Ull;typedef unsigned int uii;typedef tr1::unordered_map<ll,int>::iterator It;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; bool f=1; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}inline ll readl(){ ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s){ int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)&&ch!='?')ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)||ch=='?')s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular{ const int mod=666623333; inline int add(int a,int b){return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;} inline int Inv(int a){return ksm(a,mod-2);} inline void fix(int&a){a=(a%mod+mod)%mod;}}using namespace modular;template<typename T>inline void ckmin(T&a,T b){a>b?a=b:0;}template<typename T>inline void ckmax(T&a,T b){a<b?a=b:0;}const int N=2005;int cnt=0,f[N][N],g[N],n,q,x;inline void init(){ static int pw[N]; for(ri i=1;i<=x;++i)pw[i]=1; for(ri i=0,res,iv=Inv(x),mt=1;i<=n;++i,Mul(mt,iv)){ res=0; for(ri j=1;j<=x;++j){ Add(res,pw[j]); Mul(pw[j],j); } g[i]=mul(res,mt); }}pii a[N];inline void check(){ static bool vs[N]; static int ans[N]; for(ri s=0,up=1<<q;s<up;++s){ int ct1=0,ct2=0; for(ri i=1;i<=q;++i){ if(s>>(i-1)&1){ ++ct1; for(ri j=a[i].fi;j<=a[i].se;++j)vs[j]=1; } } for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ if(vs[i])++ct2; vs[i]=0; } ct1&1?Dec(ans[ct2],1):Add(ans[ct2],1); } int res=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)cerr<<ans[i]<<' '; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)Add(res,mul(ans[i],g[i])); q&1?res=dec(0,res):0; puts(""); cerr<<res<<'\n';}struct sgt{ #define lc (p<<1) #define rc (p<<1|1) #define mid (l+r>>1) int ss[N<<2]; bool cle[N<<2]; inline void pushnow(int p){ ss[p]=0; cle[p]=1; } inline void pushdown(int p){ if(cle[p]){ pushnow(lc); pushnow(rc); cle[p]=0; } } inline void pushup(int p){ss[p]=add(ss[lc],ss[rc]);} inline void update(int p,int l,int r,int k,int v){ if(l==r){ Add(ss[p],v); return; } pushdown(p); k<=mid?update(lc,l,mid,k,v):update(rc,mid+1,r,k,v); pushup(p); } inline void modify(int p,int l,int r,int ql,int qr){ if(ql<=l&&r<=qr)return pushnow(p); pushdown(p); if(qr<=mid)modify(lc,l,mid,ql,qr); else if(ql>mid)modify(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr); else modify(lc,l,mid,ql,qr),modify(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr); pushup(p); } inline int query(int p,int l,int r,int ql,int qr){ if(ql<=l&&r<=qr)return ss[p]; pushdown(p); if(qr<=mid)return query(lc,l,mid,ql,qr); if(ql>mid)return query(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr); return add(query(lc,l,mid,ql,qr),query(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr)); } #undef lc #undef rc #undef mid}s1[N],s2[N];inline void update(int a,int b,int vl){ if(!vl)return; s1[a].update(1,0,n,b,vl); s2[b-a].update(1,0,n,a,vl);}int sig=0;inline bool cmp(pii a,pii b){return a.fi^b.fi?a.fi>b.fi:a.se<b.se;}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),x=read(),q=read(); init(); for(ri i=1;i<=q;++i)a[i].fi=read(),a[i].se=read(); sort(a+1,a+q+1,cmp); int mnr=0x3f3f3f3f; for(ri i=1;i<=q;++i){ if(mnr>a[i].se){ mnr=a[i].se; a[++sig]=a[i]; } } q=sig; sort(a+1,a+q+1); update(0,0,mod-1); for(ri i=1,l,r,len;i<=q;++i){ l=a[i].fi,r=a[i].se,len=r-l+1; for(ri j=0;j+len<=n&&j<l;++j)update(j+len,r,dec(0,s1[j].query(1,0,n,0,l-1))); if(l<r)for(ri j=1;j<r;++j)update(j+1,r,dec(0,s2[r-j-1].query(1,0,n,max(j+l-r+1,1),j))); } int res=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)Add(res,mul(g[i],s1[i].query(1,0,n,0,n))); cout<<res; return 0;} 考虑继续优化 经过观察发现如果一个大区间包含了一个小区间，那么大区间可以舍掉，因为最终答案一定在小区间中，于是在进行掉这一步处理之后所有询问区间的左右端点都是单增的，也就是说对于第三种转移后面的 fi,jf_{i,j}fi,j​ 本来就是 000 ，那么只用维护行前缀和和对角线前缀和即可，复杂度为 O(qlog⁡q+n2)O(q\log q+n^2)O(qlogq+n2) ，可以加强到 n≤5000,x≤1e9,q≤1e6n\le5000,x\le 1e9,q\le1e6n≤5000,x≤1e9,q≤1e6 了 CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121#include<bits/stdc++.h>#include<tr1/unordered_map>#define ri register int#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef pair<ll,int> pli;typedef pair<int,ll> pil;typedef unsigned long long Ull;typedef unsigned int uii;typedef tr1::unordered_map<ll,int>::iterator It;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; bool f=1; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}inline ll readl(){ ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s){ int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)&&ch!='?')ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)||ch=='?')s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular{ const int mod=666623333; inline int add(int a,int b){return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;} inline int Inv(int a){return ksm(a,mod-2);} inline void fix(int&a){a=(a%mod+mod)%mod;}}using namespace modular;template<typename T>inline void ckmin(T&a,T b){a>b?a=b:0;}template<typename T>inline void ckmax(T&a,T b){a<b?a=b:0;}const int N=2005;int cnt=0,f[N][N],g[N],n,q,x;inline void init(){ static int pw[N]; for(ri i=1;i<=x;++i)pw[i]=1; for(ri i=0,res,iv=Inv(x),mt=1;i<=n;++i,Mul(mt,iv)){ res=0; for(ri j=1;j<=x;++j){ Add(res,pw[j]); Mul(pw[j],j); } g[i]=mul(res,mt); }}pii a[N];int s1[N][N],s2[N][N];int sig=0;inline bool cmp(pii a,pii b){return a.fi^b.fi?a.fi>b.fi:a.se<b.se;}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),x=read(),q=read(); init(); for(ri i=1;i<=q;++i)a[i].fi=read(),a[i].se=read(); sort(a+1,a+q+1,cmp); int mnr=0x3f3f3f3f; for(ri i=1;i<=q;++i){ if(mnr>a[i].se){ mnr=a[i].se; a[++sig]=a[i]; } } q=sig; sort(a+1,a+q+1); s1[0][0]=s2[0][0]=f[0][0]=mod-1; int prer=0; for(ri i=1,prer=0,l,r,len;i<=q;++i){ l=a[i].fi,r=a[i].se,len=r-l+1; while(prer<r-1){ ++prer; for(ri j=0;j<=prer;++j){ s1[j][prer]=add(s1[j][prer-1],f[j][prer]); s2[prer-j][j]=add(j?s2[prer-j][j-1]:0,f[j][prer]); } } for(ri t,j=0;j+len<=n&&j<l;++j){ t=s1[j][l-1]; if(t)Add(f[j+len][r],mod-t); } if(l<r)for(ri t,j=1;j<r;++j){ t=dec(s2[r-j-1][j],s2[r-j-1][max(j+l-r,0)]); if(t)Add(f[j+1][r],mod-t); } } while(prer<n){ ++prer; for(ri i=0;i<=prer;++i){ s1[i][prer]=add(s1[i][prer-1],f[i][prer]); s2[prer-i][i]=add(i?s2[prer-i][i-1]:0,f[i][prer]); } } int res=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)Add(res,mul(g[i],s1[i][n])); cout<<res; return 0;} 地震后的幻想乡 解题思路： 看到全排列就想到状压连通块子集 dpdpdp ，设 fs,if_{s,i}fs,i​ 表示当前连通块为 sss ，用了 iii 条边使得其连通的方案数， gs,ig_{s,i}gs,i​ 表示其不连通的方案数，补集转化转移最后统计答案即可 CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283848586878889909192#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondusing namespace std;typedef double db;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef pair<ll,int> pli;typedef pair<int,ll> pil;typedef unsigned long long Ull;typedef unsigned int uii;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; bool f=1; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}inline ll readl(){ ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s){ int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)&&ch!='?')ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)||ch=='?')s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular{ const int mod=666623333; inline int add(int a,int b){return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;} inline int Inv(int a){return ksm(a,mod-2);} inline void fix(int&a){a=(a%mod+mod)%mod;}}using namespace modular;template<typename T>inline void ckmin(T&a,T b){a>b?a=b:0;}template<typename T>inline void ckmax(T&a,T b){a<b?a=b:0;}db f[1<<10][46],g[1<<10][46],C[46][46];int n,m,all,cnt[1<<10],pw[11];inline void init(){ pw[0]=1; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)pw[i]=pw[i-1]+pw[i-1]; for(ri i=0;i<=m;++i){ C[i][0]=1; for(ri j=1;j<=i;++j)C[i][j]=C[i-1][j-1]+C[i-1][j]; }}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(); init(); all=pw[n]-1; for(ri i=1,a,b;i<=m;++i){ a=read()-1,b=read()-1; for(ri s=all^pw[a]^pw[b],t=s;;t=(t-1)&s){ ++cnt[t^pw[a]^pw[b]]; if(!t)break; } } for(ri s=0;s<=all;++s){ for(ri i=0;i<=cnt[s];++i){ for(ri ts=s^(s&-s),t=ts;t;t=(t-1)&ts){ for(ri j=0,up=min(cnt[t],i);j<=up;++j) g[s][i]+=C[cnt[t]][j]*f[s^t][i-j]; } f[s][i]=C[cnt[s]][i]-g[s][i]; } } db res=0; for(ri i=0;i<=m;++i)res+=g[all][i]/C[m][i]; res/=m+1; printf("%.6lf",res); return 0;} Hero meet devil 解题思路： [TJOI2018][TJOI2018][TJOI2018] 某题的原型吧，设 fi,jf_{i,j}fi,j​ 表示当前枚举到构造串的第 iii 位，对于模板串的 LCSLCSLCS 状态为 jjj 的方案数，然后直接转移就行了 CODE
